title: RMW1220_AMZ 1,000-Watt 1.2-Cubic-Foot Stainless Steel Combination Microwave, Digital Air Fryer, and Convection Oven
description: The RCA 1,000 Watt 1.2 Cu. Ft. Stainless Steel Combination Microwave, Digital Air Fryer, and Convection Oven is a 3-in-1 kitchen appliance that handles all your cooking needs efficiently and easily! Use each cooking method individually or combine them for fast, healthy, easy-made meals. With 10 power levels, five 1-touch cooking methods, and a programmable defrosting mode, incredible cooking customization is at your fingertips. Learn the ins and outs of your new multifunction oven with an included handy user manual, complete with suggested cooking times and optimal program usage. Cook healthier meals using the air frying cooking method, using little to no oil. Other included cooking methods can combine oven features to make the ideal meal. Users can program their oven to use convection and microwave heat to get ideal results fast. Convection temperatures can reach up to 375°F while air frying temperatures get up to 400°F. A programmable defrosting preset allows you to cook your frozen foods faster, right out of the freezer. This stylish multi-oven is great for any kitchen and is built with a brushed stainless steel outer shell. The easy-to-use control panel features big, easy-to-read buttons, and will guide you to fast and healthier cooking in no time!
